Original:
我來自美國。雖然我是ABC，酒吧老闆對我好，會跟我說英文，讓我覺得很受歡迎。

謝謝你們給我很好的夜晚。我很期待下次見面。
EN:
I am from the United States.Although I am ABC, the bar owner is good to me and will tell me English, which makes me feel very popular.

Thank you for giving me a good night.I am looking forward to meeting next time.

Original:
不錯的酒吧，氣氛很好，工作人員很細心。推薦的白酒（智利夏多內）非常好，帶有一點橡木味。一瓶價格為1300新台幣，男性最低500新台幣，女性最低300新台幣，並強制收取10％的服務費。不是我最喜歡的，但考慮到我們進去時他們給我們提供了熱毛巾、爆米花和茶，我就放棄了。

雖小但精選的葡萄酒和威士忌。不要指望在這裡很難找到威士忌，但他們有很多不錯的選擇（一系列卡瓦蘭、麥卡倫和百富）以及優質但種類不多的葡萄酒。

如果不是強制最低標準，我會給它 4.5 顆星，但考慮到我們只能給整顆星，我會給它 5 顆星。
EN:
A good bar, the atmosphere is very good, the staff is very careful.The recommended liquor (Chilexia) is very good, with a little oak flavor.The price of a bottle is NT $ 1,300, the minimum of NT $ 500, the minimum of NT $ 300, and forced to charge a 10 % service fee.It ’s not my favorite, but considering that when we entered, they provided us with hot towels, popcorn and tea, and I gave up.

Although small but selected wine and whiskey.Don't expect to find whiskey here, but they have a lot of good choices (a series of Cavalan, Macarren and Geofer) and high -quality but not much wine.

If it is not for the minimum standard, I will give it 4.5 stars, but considering that we can only give the whole star, I will give it 5 stars.

Original: Blush 是鎮上「最」的地方！讓你全程臉紅的飲品、服務、場地！這裡非常歡迎國際遊客。乾杯!普羅斯特！
EN: Blush is the "most" place in the town!Drinks, services, and venues that make you blush throughout!International tourists are very welcome here.Toast! Prove!
